metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6240 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The chroot, jail, and zone connection plugins in ansible before 1.9.2 allow local users to escape a restricted environment via a symlink attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6240` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.9.2+dfsg-2
ansible-fireball - 1.9.2+dfsg-2
ansible-node-fireball - 1.9.2+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2+dfsg-2').
